## buildLocalModules variable

Builds `local module`<!-- -->s.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
buildLocalModules: TaskOptions<import("./config").SetConfigHooks & import("./project").SetProjectHooks & BuildLocalModulesHooks, never>
```

## Remarks

`local module` is the `module` of `local package`<!-- -->s. Check [MetaModule](./packer.metamodule.md) for more information about `module`<!-- -->.
